questions: Q. 1. What is the difference between personal communication and mass communication ? State any two points of importance of mass communication.
answers: Ans. Personal communication means a communication between two persons either through oral, letter or  through telephone etc, while mass communication includes the use of radio, television, press, films etc, for wider public audience. The two points of importance of mass communication are  provides entertainment and  creates awareness among people about various national programmes and policies.  3
